content: Am interested in using Lean as a correct-by-construction general programming language, and I've read in the article about Lean4Lean that it fails to be strongly normalizing. Do we know what fragments are at least weakly normalizing?
if you exclude Acc and never reduce proofs it's plausible that the resulting system is strongly normalizing
